props.controlHeight: Sets the height of the controls.
props.controlVariant:
- **docked:** Separate control groups for month and year.
- **modal:** Month and year are displayed together, clicking the text opens a month picker, clicking the dropdown arrow opens a year picker. There are also arrow buttons to scroll between months.
props.modeIcon: Icon used for the mode button.
props.nextIcon: Icon used for the next button.
props.noMonthPicker: Only applies to `controlVariant="modal"`, the month and year picker buttons are combined into one that only opens the year picker.
props.prevIcon: Icon used for the previous button.
props.viewMode: Sets the view mode of the date picker.

events.click:month: Event fired when clicking on the month.
events.click:next: Event fired when clicking the next button.
events.click:prev: Event fired when clicking the previous button.
events.click:year: Event fired when clicking the date text.
events.click:text: Event fired when clicking the year.
